title: Longtime Companion (1990) Campbell Scott (Gay interest, opt.Subs

With Dermot Mulroney and Mary-Louise Parker

Perhaps the first film to put a human face on the AIDS epidemic, this story follows the lives of a small circle of gay friends from the first mention of the disease in the New York Times in 1981. 

I was amazed to find that this heartwarming classic is no longer available at any torrent sites, so I made a rip. 

Widescreen 2-pass 624x336, original mono sound AC3.
Burn tested, runs well in both my standalone DivX players.
